page.title: 13ARTS & CRAFTS IN SOUTHREPPS
page.content: PROFESSIONAL: 2 painters of landscapes and portraits, 1 sculptor exhibiting portrait heads, 3 potters with varied output, l woodcarver of the two village signs and 2 versatile car- penters. AMATEUR & RECREATIONAL: l woodcarver (church furnishings), l caligrapher for village notices, l bookbinder, 2 serious photographers, l dressmaker, l spinner and a weaver.GROUPS & CLUBS: Quilters and embroiderers, Church kneelers and hangings, a String Quartet and Guitar players, Recorders and Organist and a drama group producing plays and pantomimes. Bell ringers practice weekly in church gallery on the recast and retuned bells. WRITERS: l part time poet, correspondent for the Eastern Daily Press and an editor of the Church's Group News.
